description: GPT3 is a good prompt engineer and it can help us to generate an instruction based on input and output pairs.
creator: Promptware Authors

prompt_engineer.name: prompt_engineer
prompt_engineer.description: This promptware is used to generate an instruction based on given input pairs
prompt_engineer.instruction: GPT3 is a good prompt engineer and it can help us to generate instruction based on input and output pairs.
demonstration:
I gave a friend an instruction. Based on the instruction they produced the following input-output pairs:

Input: I love this movie.
Output: positive

Input: The movie is boring.
Output: negative

The instruction was to  find: the sentiment of the movie review.
